entry.title: Newsletter #112
entry.content:
Hi there!

The week is over and a we have a new good list of links for you.

  • 40 blogs every software developer should be reading

  • chad fowler – the wunderlist 3 story

  • floating ips: start architecting your applications for high availability | digitalocean

  • front-end handbook – gitbook

  • golang uk conference 2015 (videos)

  • henryr/cap-faq

  • lessons from five years in mobile news apps:

  • motion ui | playground from zurb

  • opt-in transparency

  • pablo 2.0: create social media images, perfect for everywhere

  • product hunt is everywhere – this is how it got there – first round review

  • react is an exciting future – atlassian developers

  • reactiflux is moving to discord

  • stackfiles.io

  • the go netpoller – morsing’s blog

  • the shapes of css

  • the top 8 reasons your best people are about to quit — and how you can keep them – forbes

  • tracking.js

  • why i don’t answer most phone calls — life tips. — medium

  • your os sucks

  • youtube will completely remove videos of creators who don’t sign its red subscription deal | techcrunch

entry.title: Newsletter #97
entry.content:
TechThursday is here!

Always on the move: Our brand new office (WIP).

Here you can find our last list of links:
